verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, If any one<WH5315> shall sin<WH2398> unwittingly<WH7684>, in any of the things which Jehovah<WH3068> hath commanded<WH4687> not to be done<WH6213>, and shall do<WH6213> any<WH259> one of them<WH2007>:

if the anointed<WH4899> priest<WH3548> shall sin<WH2398> so as to bring guilt<WH819> on the people<WH5971>, then let him offer<WH7126> for his sin<WH2403>, which he hath sinned<WH2398>, a young<WH1241> bullock<WH6499> without blemish<WH8549> unto Jehovah<WH3068> for a sin-offering<WH2403>.

And he shall bring<WH935> the bullock<WH6499> unto the door<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; and he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of the bullock<WH6499>, and kill<WH7819> the bullock<WH6499> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And the anointed<WH4899> priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the bullock<WH6499>, and bring<WH935> it to the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>:

and the priest<WH3548> shall dip<WH2881> his finger<WH676> in the blood<WH1818>, and sprinkle<WH5137> of the blood<WH1818> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, before<WH6440> the veil<WH6532> of the sanctuary<WH6944>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall put<WH5414> of the blood<WH1818> upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, which is in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>; and all the blood<WH1818> of the bullock<WH6499> shall he pour<WH8210> out at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>, which is at the door<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.

And all the fat<WH2459> of the bullock<WH6499> of the sin-offering<WH2403> he shall take off<WH7311> from it<WH2459>; the fat that covereth<WH3680> the inwards<WH7130>, and all the fat<WH2459> that is upon the inwards<WH7130>,

and the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629>, and the fat<WH2459> that is upon them<WH3689>, which is by the loins, and the caul<WH3508> upon the liver<WH3516>, with the kidneys<WH3629>, shall he take away<WH5493>,
as it is taken off<WH7311> from the ox<WH7794> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace-offerings<WH8002>: and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them upon the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>.
And the skin<WH5785> of the bullock<WH6499>, and all its flesh<WH1320>, with its head<WH7218>, and with its legs<WH3767>, and its inwards<WH7130>, and its dung<WH6569>,

even the whole bullock<WH6499> shall he carry forth<WH3318> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264> unto a clean<WH2889> place<WH4725>, where the ashes<WH1880> are poured out<WH8211>, and burn<WH8313> it on wood<WH6086> with fire<WH784>: where<WH413> the ashes<WH1880> are poured out<WH8211> shall it be burnt<WH8313>.

And if the whole congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478> err<WH7686>, and the thing<WH1697> be hid<WH5956> from the eyes<WH5869> of the assembly<WH6951>, and they have done<WH6213> any<WH259> of the things which Jehovah<WH3068> hath commanded<WH4687> not to be done<WH6213>, and are guilty<WH816>;

when the sin<WH2403> wherein they have sinned<WH2398> is known<WH3045>, then the assembly<WH6951> shall offer<WH7126> a young<WH1241> bullock<WH6499> for a sin-offering<WH2403>, and bring<WH935> it before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.

And the elders<WH2205> of the congregation<WH5712> shall lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of the bullock<WH6499> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; and the bullock<WH6499> shall be killed<WH7819> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And the anointed<WH4899> priest<WH3548> shall bring<WH935> of the blood<WH1818> of the bullock<WH6499> to the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>:
and the priest<WH3548> shall dip<WH2881> his finger<WH676> in the blood<WH1818>, and sprinkle<WH5137> it seven<WH7651> times<WH6471> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, before<WH6440> the veil<WH6532>.

And he shall put<WH5414> of the blood<WH1818> upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> which is before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, that is in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>; and all the blood<WH1818> shall he pour out<WH8210> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>, which is at the door<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.
And all the fat<WH2459> thereof shall he take<WH7311> off from it<WH6999>, and burn it upon the altar<WH4196>.

Thus shall he do<WH6213> with the bullock<WH6499>; as he did<WH6213> with the bullock<WH6499> of the sin-offering<WH2403>, so shall he do<WH6213> with this<WH3548>; and the priest shall make atonement<WH3722> for them<WH5545>, and they shall be forgiven.

And he shall carry forth<WH3318> the bullock<WH6499> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>, and burn<WH8313> it as he burned<WH8313> the first<WH7223> bullock<WH6499>: it is the sin-offering<WH2403> for the assembly<WH6951>.

When a ruler<WH5387> sinneth<WH2398>, and doeth<WH6213> unwittingly<WH7684> any<WH259> one of all the things which Jehovah<WH3068> his God<WH430> hath commanded<WH4687> not to be done<WH6213>, and is guilty<WH816>;
if his sin<WH2403>, wherein he hath sinned<WH2398>, be made known<WH3045> to him<WH935>, he shall bring for his oblation<WH7133> a<WH8163> goat<WH8163>, a male<WH2145> without blemish<WH8549>.

And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of the goat<WH8163>, and kill<WH7819> it in the place<WH4725> where they kill<WH7819> the burnt-offering<WH5930> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>: it is a sin-offering<WH5930>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the sin-offering<WH2403> with his finger<WH676>, and put<WH5414> it upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>; and the blood<WH1818> thereof shall he pour out<WH8210> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>.

And all the fat<WH2459> thereof shall he burn<WH6999> upon the altar<WH4196>, as the fat<WH2459> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace-offerings<WH2077>; and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for him as concerning his sin<WH2403>, and he shall be forgiven<WH5545>.

And if any<WH259> one<WH5315> of the common<WH776> people<WH5971> sin<WH2398> unwittingly<WH7684>, in doing<WH6213> any<WH259> of the things which Jehovah<WH3068> hath commanded<WH4687> not to be done<WH6213>, and be guilty<WH816>;

if his sin<WH2403>, which he hath sinned<WH2398>, be made known<WH3045> to him<WH935>, then he shall bring for his oblation<WH7133> a<WH8166> goat<WH8166>, a female<WH5347> without blemish<WH8549>, for his sin<WH2403> which he hath sinned<WH2398>.
And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of the sin-offering<WH2403>, and kill<WH7819> the sin-offering<WH2403> in the place<WH4725> of burnt-offering<WH2403>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> thereof with his finger<WH676>, and put<WH5414> it upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>; and all the blood<WH1818> thereof shall he pour out<WH8210> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196>.

And all the fat<WH2459> thereof shall he take away<WH5493>, as the fat<WH2459> is taken away<WH5493> from off the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace-offerings<WH8002>; and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> it upon the altar<WH4196> for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>; and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for him<WH5545>, and he shall be forgiven.
And if he bring<WH935> a lamb<WH3532> as his oblation for a<WH2403> sin-offering<WH7133>, he shall bring<WH935> it a female<WH5347> without blemish<WH8549>.

And he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of the sin-offering<WH2403>, and kill<WH7819> it for a sin-offering<WH2403> in the place<WH4725> where they kill<WH7819> the burnt-offering<WH2403>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the sin-offering<WH2403> with his finger<WH676>, and put<WH5414> it upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>; and all the blood<WH1818> thereof shall he pour out<WH8210> at the base<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196>.

And all the fat<WH2459> thereof shall he take away<WH5493>, as the fat<WH2459> of the lamb<WH3775> is taken away<WH5493> from the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace-offerings<WH8002>; and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them on the altar<WH4196>, upon the offerings of Jehovah<WH3068> made by fire<WH801>; and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for him as touching his sin<WH2403> that he hath sinned<WH2398>, and he shall be forgiven<WH5545>.
